about_the_game:
Do you wish the game wasn't free?
Well... you wish for strange things!


The "Loop-Loop DX: Supporter Pack" is the ultimate option for those who wish to support the developer!


It comes with the following benefits:
  • Smiley Mode
    Having a bad day?
    Brighten it up with "Smiley Mode"!
    This mode puts smiley faces on every enemy, no matter how broken it looks!

  • Party Mode
    Liven up the game with a constant barrage of confetti and balloons!
    Every moment is worth celebrating in this mode!

  • Toot Mode
    Every sound effect is replaced with a fart sound.
    INCREDIBLE!

  • Loop-Loop XD
    50% of the time, the title on the main menu will display as "Loop-Loop XD" rather than the standard "Loop-Loop DX".

content_descriptors.notes:
The base game contains "no-no words".

The DLC doesn't add any more mature content than what is already present in the base game.

Minimum:

  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: On-board sound

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP
  • Processor: Intel Dual Core or Equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible video card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: On-board sound
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Dual Core or Equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible video card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: On-board sound
